About Me

I am a brand-new web developer, keen to expand my skills in all areas of development.

Before I started this course I had never written code before. I was inspired to enroll thanks to a friend who was on a previous CYF cohort and now has a job working as a developer.

I am originally from Brighton in the south of England, and moved to Glasgow in 2016. I love being creative and enjoy illustration and photography. I'm also a qualified nail technician and love to transfer my passion and skill for art and design into this.
